title: DNA construct
description: Schema for submitting an expression or targeting vector stably or transiently transfected.

construct_type.title: Type
construct_type.description: The type of sequence expressed from the construct.
construct_type.comment: Locking down to prevent new constructs from being submitted.

description.title: Description
description.description: A plain text description of the construct. May include backbone name, description of the insert or purpose of the construct.

elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.title: Field mapping index type
elasticsearch_mapping_index_type.description: Defines one of three types of indexing available

target.title: Target
target.description: The name of the gene whose expression or product is modified by the construct.

items.title: Protein tag
items.comment: Submit tag name and tag location.

vector_backbone_name.title: Backbone name
vector_backbone_name.description: The name of the vector backbone used for the construct.

genomic_integration_site.title: Integration site
genomic_integration_site.description: Genomic coordinates where construct is integrated, if known.

assembly.title: Genome assembly
assembly.description: The genome assembly to which the target coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38 or dm6

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. e.g. 1, 2L, or X

end.title: End
end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)

insert_sequence.title: Insert Sequence
insert_sequence.description: DNA sequence inserted into the vector backbone.

insert_genome_coordinates.title: Insert genome coordinates
insert_genome_coordinates.description: Genomic coordinates of the insert. e.g. GRCh38 or dm6.

assembly.title: Genome assembly
assembly.description: The genome assembly to which the target coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. e.g. 1, 2L, or X

end.title: End
end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)

promoter_used.title: Promoter used in construct
promoter_used.description: The name of the gene that the promoter regulates natively.

promoter_genome_coordinates.title: Promoter genome coordinates
promoter_genome_coordinates.description: Genomic coordinates of the promoter. Use NCBI assembly version:chromosome number:nucleotide range (e.g. WBcel235:III:1433720-1434340).

assembly.title: Genome assembly
assembly.description: The GRC genome assembly to which the target coordinates relate. e.g. GRCh38

chromosome.title: Chromosome
chromosome.description: The number (or letter) designation for the target chromosome. e.g. 1, 2L, or X

end.title: End
end.description: The ending coordinate (possibly equal to the starting coordinate for one base.)

promoter_position_relative_to_target.title: Promoter position relative to target
promoter_position_relative_to_target.description: Relative distance of promoter sequence in the construct upstream of the target gene TSS.
promoter_position_relative_to_target.comment: Distance in bp upstream of target gene TSS in the construct
